author: Anthony Spadafora
title: Intel, Mozilla join initiative to make IP available to coronavirus efforts
description: The Open COVID Pledge aims to make IP available to scientists and researchers combating Covid-19.
content:
Intel, Mozilla, Creative Commons and a number of other organizations have joined the Open COVID Pledge in an effort to make intellectual property (IP) available in the fight against Covid-19.
